ll n, k,ans;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    { ans=0;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);
        if(k==1)
        {
            printf("%lld\n",n);
            continue;
        }
        while(n)
        {
            ans+=n%k;
            n=n/k;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
